label: OpenAI Assistants
name: openaiAssistants
description: Perform operations with OpenAI Assistants API

options.label: List Assistants
options.name: listAssistants
options.description: Fetches a list of all assistants.

options.label: Create Assistant
options.name: createAssistant
options.description: Creates a new assistant.

options.label: Get Assistant
options.name: getAssistant
options.description: Retrieves details of a specific assistant using the assistant ID.

options.label: Modify Assistant
options.name: modifyAssistant
options.description: Modifies an existing assistant using the assistant ID.

options.label: Delete Assistant
options.name: deleteAssistant
options.description: Deletes an assistant using the assistant ID.

options.label: List Threads
options.name: listThreads
options.description: Fetches a list of all threads.

options.label: Create Thread
options.name: createThread
options.description: Creates a new thread.

options.label: Get Thread
options.name: getThread
options.description: Retrieves details of a specific thread using the thread ID.

options.label: Modify Thread
options.name: modifyThread
options.description: Modifies an existing thread using the thread ID.

options.label: Delete Thread
options.name: deleteThread
options.description: Deletes a thread using the thread ID.

options.label: List Messages
options.name: listMessages
options.description: Fetches a list of all messages for a thread.

options.label: Create Message
options.name: createMessage
options.description: Creates a new message in a thread.

options.label: Get Message
options.name: getMessage
options.description: Retrieves details of a specific message using the message ID.

options.label: List Runs
options.name: listRuns
options.description: Fetches a list of all runs.

options.label: Get Run
options.name: getRun
options.description: Retrieves details of a specific run using the run ID.

options.label: Cancel Run
options.name: cancelRun
options.description: Cancels a specific run using the run ID.

options.label: List Run Steps
options.name: listRunSteps
options.description: Fetches a list of all run steps.

options.label: Get Run Step
options.name: getRunStep
options.description: Retrieves details of a specific run step using the run step ID.

options.label: List Vector Stores
options.name: listVectorStores
options.description: Fetches a list of all vector stores.

options.label: Create Vector Store
options.name: createVectorStore
options.description: Creates a new vector store.

options.label: Get Vector Store
options.name: getVectorStore
options.description: Retrieves details of a specific vector store using the vector store ID.

options.label: Delete Vector Store
options.name: deleteVectorStore
options.description: Deletes a vector store using the vector store ID.

options.label: List Vector Store Files
options.name: listVectorStoreFiles
options.description: Fetches a list of all vector store files.

options.label: Upload Vector Store File
options.name: uploadVectorStoreFile
options.description: Uploads a new vector store file.

options.label: Get Vector Store File
options.name: getVectorStoreFile
options.description: Retrieves details of a specific vector store file using the file ID.

options.label: Delete Vector Store File
options.name: deleteVectorStoreFile
options.description: Deletes a vector store file using the file ID.

options.label: List Vector Store File Batches
options.name: listVectorStoreFileBatches
options.description: Fetches a list of all vector store file batches.

options.label: Create Vector Store File Batch
options.name: createVectorStoreFileBatch
options.description: Creates a new vector store file batch.

options.label: Get Vector Store File Batch
options.name: getVectorStoreFileBatch
options.description: Retrieves details of a specific vector store file batch using the batch ID.

options.label: Delete Vector Store File Batch
options.name: deleteVectorStoreFileBatch
options.description: Deletes a vector store file batch using the batch ID.

inputParameters.label: Assistant ID
inputParameters.name: assistant_id
inputParameters.description: The ID of the assistant.

inputParameters.label: Thread ID
inputParameters.name: thread_id
inputParameters.description: The ID of the thread.

inputParameters.label: Message ID
inputParameters.name: message_id
inputParameters.description: The ID of the message.

inputParameters.label: Run ID
inputParameters.name: run_id
inputParameters.description: The ID of the run.

inputParameters.label: Run Step ID
inputParameters.name: run_step_id
inputParameters.description: The ID of the run step.

inputParameters.label: Vector Store ID
inputParameters.name: vector_store_id
inputParameters.description: The ID of the vector store.

inputParameters.label: Vector Store File ID
inputParameters.name: vector_store_file_id
inputParameters.description: The ID of the vector store file.

inputParameters.label: Vector Store File Batch ID
inputParameters.name: vector_store_file_batch_id
inputParameters.description: The ID of the vector store file batch.

inputParameters.label: Name
inputParameters.name: name
inputParameters.description: The name of the assistant.

inputParameters.label: Description
inputParameters.name: description
inputParameters.description: The description of the assistant.

inputParameters.label: Functions
inputParameters.name: functions
inputParameters.description: The functions for the assistant.

inputParameters.label: Memory Settings
inputParameters.name: memory_settings
inputParameters.description: The memory settings for the assistant.

inputParameters.label: Log Settings
inputParameters.name: log_settings
inputParameters.description: The log settings for the assistant.

inputParameters.label: Configuration
inputParameters.name: configuration
inputParameters.description: The configuration details for the assistant.

inputParameters.label: Limit
inputParameters.name: limit
inputParameters.description: The limit on the number of objects to be returned.

inputParameters.label: Order
inputParameters.name: order
inputParameters.description: The order of the objects to be returned.

inputParameters.label: After
inputParameters.name: after
inputParameters.description: The cursor after which to return the results.

inputParameters.label: Before
inputParameters.name: before
inputParameters.description: The cursor before which to return the results.

inputParameters.label: Metadata
inputParameters.name: metadata
inputParameters.description: The metadata for the object.

inputParameters.label: Tool Resources
inputParameters.name: tool_resources
inputParameters.description: The tool resources for the thread.

inputParameters.label: Messages
inputParameters.name: messages
inputParameters.description: The messages to start the thread with.
